instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.820-3437: What is 820-3437? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.
definitions.A1466: What is A1466? A1466 is a model number for a 13 inch size MacBook Air from years Early 2015, 2017, Mid 2012, Mid 2013, Early 2014 with EMC 2925, that may contain one of these boards depending on the year & configuration: 820-00165, 820-3209, 820-3437..

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3437</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> no serial number.
threads.message:
Friend could help me with this problem, I have no jellyfish yet, only ch341a.  
     I can extract this BIOS file even without the s/n ? if not, please send BIOS file with this serial C02N4E1PG085.

Model: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3437</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-a     <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1466</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>   macbook air 13' 2013.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3437</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> no serial number.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3437</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> no serial number.
threads.message: In the diagnosis by pressing the "D" when it switches on, it indicated this defect without serial number. That worked out, buddy, thanks!
